Text:
Great package, does exactly what it says on the tin!!

Now i just have to try and learn how to play it, im new to strategy games, but love anything to do with WW2 battles so should be fun.

Thanks.
does this game require TOW I installed ?
No, its the sequel so its a standalone. No need for TOW I. This is a good game and it works properly.

We need the Centauro add on and the newest one Kursk.

Please

That's affirmative! Awseome game and really wanting more , the Kursk demo is  simply mouthwatering! Thx if someone will do that! Oh and thx a lot for this too! I never been a fan of games like these but this a good mixture of genres with also awesome graphics  and effects! Nice and recommended! :-)
It's nice BUT only small content (?) and how to turn off the damned "smart pause" which is really annoying!? It is possibily though in other TOW !? WTF!?
Please seed ! at first it went fast with 20 seeders but now i've got 0 seeders!

Can't friggin play one mission without it CRASHING, terminating on exit. My system does NOT crash without there being something wrong with the files. I loved the previous games, but this is just silly.
And the mission edit DOES NOT WORK...
I hope this torrent works!!!I REALLY want this game!!!
Does anyone know if the Centauro expansion pack has ever been cracked? I can't find it anywhere.
Actually, I figured out that Skidrow released Centauro as Battle of Caen (you can find it in TPB) and battle of Caen as Centauro lol.
